attributes.action: A call for a vote of no confidence in Teresa May and a general election
attributes.additional_details: Then there is her quite apparent desperateness to find trade deals with whomever will have her, including her the willingness to sell arms to Erdoğan, a man who has a terrible human rights record,  not to mention the Abu Hamza al-Masri fiasco. So I would like a call for a vote of no confidence in her ability as Prime Minister and an emergency general election.
attributes.background: Time after time we have seen Mrs May embarrass our country on the world stage with her ineptness. Her refusal to even consider the populist vote on rescinding the invite to Trump for a state visit, is just one example of this.
